payload.title: Define Scoring System with 5 Weighted Criteria
payload.description: Implement quantitative audit system with 5 weighted criteria: Structure (20%), EARS (25%), Architecture (20%), Specification (20%), Planning (15%). Include detailed 1-10 rubric for each criterion with mandatory justification and weighted average score.
payload.notes: Revolutionary scoring system enabling objective blueprint auditing with measurable criteria and automatic recommendations.
